name: Pyroar
description: The Royal Pokémon. The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.

abilities.name: Rivalry
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds its proficiency bonus to damage when attacking a Pokémon of the same type.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.

abilities.name: Moxie
abilities.description: Upon causing an opponent to faint, this Pokémon may immediately take another action.
